abort.unique_id_mismatch: The login details correspond to a different account. Please re-authenticate to the previously configured account.

reauth_confirm.description: The Bring! integration needs to re-authenticate your account
reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]

reconfigure.description: Update your credentials if you have changed your Bring! account email or password.
reconfigure.title: Bring! configuration

data_description.email: The email address associated with your Bring! account.
data_description.password: The password to log in to your Bring! account.

user.description:
Connect your Bring! account to sync your shopping lists with Home Assistant.

Don't have a Bring! account? Download the app on [Google Play for Android]({google_play}) or the [App Store for iOS]({app_store}) to sign up.
user.title: Bring! Grocery shopping list

activity_not_found.message: Failed to send reaction for Bring! — No recent activity found

entity_not_found.message: Failed to send reaction for Bring! — Unknown entity {entity_id}

entry_not_loaded.message: The account associated with this Bring! list is either not loaded or disabled in Home Assistant.

notify_missing_argument.message: This action requires field {field}, please enter a valid value for {field}

notify_request_failed.message: Failed to send push notification for Bring! due to a connection error, try again later

reaction_request_failed.message: Failed to send reaction for Bring! due to a connection error, try again later

setup_authentication_exception.message: Authentication failed for {email}, check your email and password

setup_parse_exception.message: Failed to parse server response, try again later

setup_request_exception.message: Failed to connect to server, try again later

todo_delete_item_failed.message: Failed to delete {count} item(s) from Bring! list

todo_rename_item_failed.message: Failed to rename item {name} to Bring! list

todo_save_item_failed.message: Failed to save item {name} to Bring! list

todo_update_item_failed.message: Failed to update item {name} to Bring! list

options.changed_list: I changed the list! - Take a look at the items
options.going_shopping: I'm going shopping! - Last chance for adjustments
options.shopping_done: The shopping is done - Our fridge is well stocked
options.urgent_message: Attention! Attention! - We still urgently need: [Items]

send_message.description: Sends a mobile push notification to members of a shared Bring! list.

item.description: Item name(s) to include in an urgent message e.g. 'Attention! Attention! - We still urgently need: [Items]'
item.name: Item (Required if notification type 'Urgent message' is selected)

message.description: Type of push notification to send to list members.
message.name: Notification type

send_message.name: [%key:component::notify::services::notify::name%]

send_reaction.description: Sends a reaction to a recent activity on a Bring! list by a member of the shared list.

entity_id.description: Select the Bring! activities event entity for reacting to its most recent event
entity_id.name: Activities

reaction.description: Type of reaction to send in response.
reaction.name: Reaction

send_reaction.name: Send reaction
